page.title: 08WHERE PEOPLE FROM LEVEN WORK
page.content: We asked all the children in the school where their Mums and Dads worked.Most of them worked in Beverley and Hull,but there are quite a lot who work in neighbouring villages like Catwick,Bransburton, Seaton, Long Riston,Skidby and Beeford. We were surprised by the number of people who actually stay in the village all day. Some Dads work at sea as sailors or marine engineers, this shows our connection with Hull and the docks. The 1981 census told us that 86% of the working population of the village travel to work by car.
